instruction: Give advice to a friend whose pet just died
output: I'm so sorry for your loss. Losing a pet can be incredibly difficult, and there's no easy way to cope with that pain. Grief is an individual process and a roller coaster of emotions - know that it's okay to feel all of those feelings and give yourself time to heal. Don't be afraid to reach out and confide in the people who love you - they'll help you through this.
